# Income-Expenses Tracker

A web application for managing personal finances and tracking income/expenses.

## Features
- Add and track multiple income sources
- Record and categorize expenses
- Real-time balance calculation
- Data persistence using Local Storage
- Responsive design for mobile and desktop

## Getting Started
1. Clone the repository
```bash
git clone https://github.com/Mahalaksh143/Income-Expenses.git
```
2. Open index.html in your browser
3. Start tracking your finances

## Project Structure
```
Income-Expenses/
├── css/
│   └── style.css
├── js/
│   └── app.js
├── index.html
└── README.md
```

## Technologies
- HTML5
- CSS3
- JavaScript (ES6+)
- Local Storage API

## Usage
1. Enter income details in the income section
2. Add expenses with categories
3. View your financial summary
